set(INC

)

set(INC_SYS
)

set(SRC
  libmv-capi.h
)

set(LIB

)

if(WITH_LIBMV)
  if(WIN32)
    add_definitions(-D_USE_MATH_DEFINES)
  endif()
  add_definitions(${GFLAGS_DEFINES})
  add_definitions(${GLOG_DEFINES})
  add_definitions(-DLIBMV_GFLAGS_NAMESPACE=${GFLAGS_NAMESPACE})

  list(APPEND INC
    ${GFLAGS_INCLUDE_DIRS}
    ${GLOG_INCLUDE_DIRS}
    ../guardedalloc
  )

  list(APPEND INC_SYS
    ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIRS}
    ${PNG_INCLUDE_DIRS}
    ${ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIRS}
    ../../extern/ceres/include
    ../../extern/ceres/config
  )

  list(APPEND LIB
    extern_ceres

    ${GLOG_LIBRARIES}
    ${GFLAGS_LIBRARIES}
    ${PNG_LIBRARIES}
  )

  add_definitions(
    -DWITH_LIBMV_GUARDED_ALLOC
    -DLIBMV_NO_FAST_DETECTOR=
  )

  list(APPEND SRC
